issue.title: animesuge.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://animesuge.to/anime/overlord-iv-r77y/ep-9](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fanimesuge.to%2Fanime%2Foverlord-iv-r77y%2Fep-9) ### Comment > This does happen on your other filters there are leftover "X" icons or some ad leftover besides it. It does happen in uBlock Origin (Your filters selected) or AdGuard (Manifest V2) aswell. When i choose Fanboy's Annoyances filters these ads disappear. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/zS4cbH7.png)
